** 46th Brigade{{cite web|url=http://www.almasdarnews.com/article/massive-wave-of-syrian-army-reinforcements-to-southern-aleppo/|title=Massive Wave of Syrian Army Reinforcements to Southern Aleppo|author=Leith Fadel|work=Al-Masdar News|accessdate=10 December 2015}} ** 82th Brigade ** 155th Brigade ** 43rd Brigade * 10th Armoured Division ** 66th Brigade {{flagicon|Syria}} Syrian pro-government militias * {{flagicon image|InfoboxNDF.png}} [[National Defence Forces (Syria)|National Defence Forces]] * Local Defense Forces{{cite web|url=http://www.syriareport.net/meet-the-ldf-new-syrias-faction-operating-in-aleppo/|title=Meet the LDF, Syria’s new faction operating in Aleppo|work=Syria Report|accessdate=4 December 2015|archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20151204044438/http://www.syriareport.net/meet-the-ldf-new-syrias-faction-operating-in-aleppo/|archive-date=4 December 2015|dead-url=yes|df=dmy-all}}{{cite web|url=http://www.almasdarnews.com/article/hundreds-of-syrian-volunteers-backed-by-%E2%80%AAiraqand-%E2%80%AAiran-take-the-lead-for-%E2%80%AAaleppo%E2%80%AC/|title=Hundreds of Syrian volunteers backed by Iraq and Iran, take the lead for #Aleppo|author=News Desk|work=Al-Masdar News|accessdate=4 December 2015}} ** [[Baqir Brigade]]{{Cite web|url=http://www.aymennjawad.org/18859/the-local-defence-forces-regime-auxiliary-forces |title=The Local Defence Forces: Regime Auxiliary Forces in Aleppo |author=Aymenn Jawad Al-Tamimi |work= |date=23 May 2016 |accessdate=20 February 2018}} * {{flagicon image|Flag of the Ba'ath Party.svg}} [[Ba'ath Brigades]] * [[File:Emblem of Liwa Al-Quds.svg|17px]] [[Liwa Al-Quds|Al-Quds Brigade]] {{flagicon|Iran}} [[Islamic Revolutionary Guard Corps|IRGC]] * [[Quds Force]] * [[Ground Forces of the Islamic Revolutionary Guard Corps|IRGC Ground Forces]] |units2= [[Fatah Halab]]:
{{flagicon image|Syria-flag 1932-58 1961-63.svg}} [[Free Syrian Army]]: * Kata’eb Thuwar al-Sham * [[13th Division (Syrian rebel group)|Division 13]] {{Flagicon image|Flag of the Islamic Front (Syria) (Black).svg}} [[Islamic Front (Syria)|Islamic Front]]: * {{Flagicon image|Flag of Ahrar ash-Sham.svg}} [[Ahrar ash-Sham]] * [[Suqour al-Sham Brigade]] * {{flagicon image|Flag of Syrian Turkmens (variant 2).svg}} [[Syrian Turkmen Brigades]] ** [[Sultan Murad Division]]{{cite tweet|user=archicivilians|author=archicivilians|number=715590436904157184|date=31 March 2016|title=InfoGraphic: Sultan Murad Division - #FSA (#Syria Opposition).}}{{cite web|url=https://docs.google.com/document/d/1aI3yAmNGW1vLpJCOrhiVLqpUUIX9PG1RNsCqJGGfhxI/edit|title=Syrian Civil War factions|work=Google Docs}} |units3= {{flagicon|Islamic State of Iraq and the Levant}} [[Military activity of ISIL|Military of ISIL]] |strength1=4,000+ Shi'ite militiamen and soldiers{{cite web|url=http://www.al-monitor.com/pulse/originals/2015/10/syria-aleppo-conquest-regime-armed-rebels.html#|title=What the Aleppo offensive hides|publisher=Al-Monitor|accessdate=25 October 2015|archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20170719080927/http://www.al-monitor.com/pulse/originals/2015/10/syria-aleppo-conquest-regime-armed-rebels.html|archive-date=19 July 2017|dead-url=yes|df=dmy-all}} * 2,000 Iranian-backed fighters[http://www.nationalinterest.org/blog/the-buzz/how-iran-just-raised-the-stakes-syria-14157 This Is How Iran Just Raised the Stakes in Syria] ''[[The National Interest]]'' * 1,500 Iraqi paramilitary fighters{{cite web|url=http://www.almasdarnews.com/article/massive-northern-aleppo-offensive-set-to-begin-soon-as-iraqi-volunteers-pour-into-the-province/|title=Massive northern Aleppo offensive set to begin soon as Iraqi volunteers pour into the province|author=Leith Fadel|work=Al-Masdar News|accessdate=23 December 2015}} |strength2= Unknown |strength3= Unknown |casualties1 = |casualties2 = |casualties3 = }} {{Campaignbox Syrian Civil War}} {{Campaignbox Battle of Aleppo}} {{Campaignbox Hezbollah involvement in the Syrian Civil War}} The '''Aleppo offensive (October–December 2015)''' was an [[Military operation|operation]] that started on 16 October when the Syrian Army launched a large-scale strategic [[Offensive (military)|offensive]] south of [[Aleppo]]. The main objective of the operation was to secure the Azzan Mountains, while also creating a larger [[Buffer zone|buffer-zone]] around the Syrian Government’s only highway leading to the provincial capital.{{cite web|url=http://www.almasdarnews.com/article/breaking-syrian-army-and-hezbollah-launch-their-southern-aleppo-offensive-4-sites-captured/|title=Breaking: Syrian Army and Hezbollah Launch Their Southern Aleppo Offensive – 4 Sites Captured|author=Leith Fadel|work=Al-Masdar News}} The objective was also reportedly to set conditions for an upcoming offensive to isolate rebel forces in [[Aleppo]] City and to relieve the long-standing siege of a pro-government enclave in Aleppo Province. Gen. [[Qasem Soleimani]] was reported to have personally led the drive deep into the southern Aleppo countryside where many towns and villages were taken by government forces. Gen. Soleimani was in command of the Syrian Arab Army's 4th Mechanized Division, Hezbollah, Harakat Al-Nujaba (Iraqi), Kataebat Hezbollah (Iraqi), Liwaa Abu Fadl Al-Abbas (Iraqi), and Firqa Fatayyemoun (Afghan/Iranian volunteers).{{cite web|url=http://www.almasdarnews.com/article/reports-of-general-qassem-suleimani-being-severely-wounded-in-southern-aleppo-prove-false/|title=Reports of General Qassem Suleimani Being Severely Wounded in Southern Aleppo Prove False|author=Leith Fadel|work=Al-Masdar News|accessdate=4 December 2015}} The Syrian government's progress deep into the southern Aleppo countryside has been attributed in large part to the Iranian leadership during the offensive.{{cite web|url=http://www.al-monitor.com/pulse/originals/2015/11/syria-opposition-advance-hama-countryside.html|title=Can Syrian opposition defend both Hama and Aleppo at the same time? - Al-Monitor: the Pulse of the Middle East|publisher=Al-Monitor|accessdate=4 December 2015|archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20171010012802/http://www.al-monitor.com/pulse/originals/2015/11/syria-opposition-advance-hama-countryside.html|archive-date=10 October 2017|dead-url=yes|df=dmy-all}} ==Preparations== The origins of the planning of the offensive in Aleppo could be traced back to Gen. [[Qasem Soleimani]]'s visit to [[Moscow]] in July 2015. Gen. Soleimani was reportedly sent to Syria by the [[Supreme Leader of Iran|supreme leader]] of [[Iran]] himself, [[Ali Khamenei]], in order to discuss military matters with his Russian counterparts and coordinate a joint escalation of forces in Syria.{{cite web|url=https://www.reuters.com/article/2015/10/06/us-mideast-crisis-syria-soleimani-insigh-idUSKCN0S02BV20151006|title=How Iranian general plotted out Syrian assault in Moscow|publisher=Reuters|accessdate=16 October 2015}} One month before the offensive south of Aleppo, the military launched [[Kuweires offensive (September 2015–present)|another operation]] east of the city in an attempt to break the two-year siege of the Kuweyres military air base. Major General Qasem Soleimani reportedly traveled from [[Latakia Governorate]]'s northeastern countryside to the Al-Safeera District of southern Aleppo in order to personally oversee the first phase of the large-scale offensive in the Azzan Mountains. Soleimani did not travel alone to Aleppo – he was escorted by a large convoy of armored vehicles that were largely made up of Iraqi [[Shi’i]] militiamen; these aforementioned fighters were tasked with carrying out the planned operations around the Aleppo Governorate's countryside. Major General Suleimani traveled to Syria on the night of 12 October, to meet with the Iranian and Russian military advisors overseeing the large-scale operations around the Aleppo Governorate's rural terrain. He was joined by six other senior military officers from the [[Iranian Revolutionary Guard]]. ==The offensive== ===Syrian Government offensive=== At 10 A.M. (Damascus Time) on the morning of 16 October, the Syrian Arab Army (SAA) – in coordination with Hezbollah, the National Defense Forces (NDF), and Al-Ba'ath Battalions – launched their large-scale southern Aleppo offensive after almost one year of inactivity along this rural area in the Azzan Mountains. According to field reports from the provincial capital, the Syrian Armed Forces and Hezbollah captured four sites from the Islamist rebels of Jabhat Al-Shamiyah (Levantine Front), Harakat Ahrar Al-Sham, and the Free Syrian Army (FSA), killing a number of combatants in the process of their advance in the Aleppo Governorate's southern countryside. On 17 October, government forces backed by Shi'ite militia captured several villages, along with the Defense Battalion Base and the farms surrounding it.{{cite web|url=http://www.almasdarnews.com/article/news-alert-syrian-army-and-hezbollah-advance-to-al-shughaydilah-in-southern-aleppo/|title=News Alert: Syrian Army and Hezbollah Advance to Al-Shughaydilah in Southern Aleppo|author=Leith Fadel|work=Al-Masdar News}} By the next day, the military was in control of five villages, while it was unclear who controlled al-Shgaydalah after a rebel-counterattack to retake it from the Army.{{cite web|url=http://www.syriahr.com/en/2015/10/the-violent-clashes-continue-in-the-southern-countryside-of-aleppo-and-the-regime-forces-advance-in-the-area-again/|title=The violent clashes continue in the southern countryside of Aleppo, and the regime forces advance in the area again|author=Master|publisher=Syrian Observatory For Human Rights}}{{cite web|url=http://www.syriahr.com/en/2015/10/about-60-victims-killed-during-the-regime-forces-advancement-in-the-southern-countryside-of-aleppo/|title=About 60 victims killed during the regime forces’ advancement in the southern countryside of Aleppo|publisher=Syrian Observatory for Human Rights}} The counterattack was carried out by Sham Revolutionary Brigades and Division 13, the latter a [[CIA]]-funded secular group, with videos showing a [[TOW missile]] attack destroying a bulldozer and later capturing a [[BMP-1]].{{cite web|url=https://www.reuters.com/article/2015/10/19/us-mideast-crisis-syria-aleppo-idUSKCN0SD16O20151019|title=Syrian rebels say they receive more weapons for Aleppo battle|agency=Reuters}}{{cite av media|url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=d4SzO8wFuI0|title=Syria – FSA Division 13 aftermath of SAA bulldozer hit with BGM-71 TOW near Atbin, Hama 17/10|date=18 October 2015|publisher=YouTube}} On 19 October, government forces captured three hills.{{cite web|url=http://www.syriahr.com/en/2015/10/the-regime-forces-advance-again-in-the-southern-countryside-of-aleppo-and-take-control-of-3-hills/|title=The regime forces advance again in the southern countryside of Aleppo and take control of 3 hills|author=Edward|publisher=Syrian Observatory For Human Rights}} The commander of the [[Harakat Nour al-Din al-Zenki]] rebel group was killed in the fighting during the day.{{cite web|url=https://www.usnews.com/news/world/articles/2015/10/19/syrian-troops-advance-toward-air-base-besieged-by-is|title=Syrian troops advance toward air base besieged by IS |work=US News & World Report}} Since the beginning of the offensive, the Army lost at least 11 armored vehicles to [[BGM-71 TOW|TOW AT missiles]], according to the [[Syrian Observatory For Human Rights|SOHR]]. More weapons and ammunition were also supplied to the FSA including mortars and TOWs according to Issa Al-Turkmani, a Sultan Murad brigade spokesman. [[Saudi Arabia]] alone reportedly delivered 500 AT missiles, but another rebel spokesman said that the quantity of TOWs was inadequate for the scale of the assault, pointing out that once the missiles were distributed among the groups each ended up with just a couple of tubes, stating that they needed dozens more per group.{{cite web|url=http://www.businessinsider.com/cia-supplied-anti-tank-missiles-turned-syria-into-a-proxy-war-by-happenstance-2015-10|title=CIA-supplied anti-tank missiles turned Syria into a 'proxy war by happenstance' |date=13 October 2015|work=Business Insider}} On 20 October, a rebel official stated the "losses are heavy on both sides and the regime’s advance is very slow". Meanwhile, tens of thousands of people reportedly fled the southern Aleppo countryside.{{cite web|url=https://www.nytimes.com/2015/10/21/world/middleeast/russia-makes-an-impact-in-syrian-battle-for-control-of-aleppo.html|title=Russia Makes an Impact in Syrian Battle for Control of Aleppo|date=21 October 2015|work=The New York Times|accessdate=4 December 2015|via=New York Times}} Between 21 and 22 October, government forces took control of seven more villages.{{cite web|url=http://www.syriahr.com/en/2015/10/the-regime-forces-advance-again-and-take-control-of-villages-in-the-southern-and-eastern-countryside-of-aleppo/|title=The regime forces advance again and take control of villages in the southern and eastern countryside of Aleppo|author=Edward|publisher=Syrian Observatory For Human Rights|accessdate=25 October 2015}}{{cite web|url=http://www.almasdarnews.com/article/syrian-army-and-hezbollah-capture-three-villages-in-southern-aleppo/|title=Syrian Army and Hezbollah Capture Three Villages in Southern Aleppo|author=Leith Fadel|work=Al-Masdar News|accessdate=25 October 2015}}{{cite web|url=http://www.almasdarnews.com/article/syrian-army-and-hezbollah-make-massive-gains-in-southern-aleppo-rebel-defenses-collapse/|title=Syrian Army and Hezbollah Make Massive Gains in Southern Aleppo: Rebel Defenses Collapse|author=Leith Fadel|work=Al-Masdar News|accessdate=25 October 2015}} By this time, government forces reportedly lost at least 15 tanks, armored vehicles and bulldozers since the offensive begun.{{cite web|url=http://www.businessinsider.com/this-map-shows-the-intensifying-battle-for-syrias-largest-city-before-the-war-2015-10|title=This map shows the intensifying battle for Syria's largest city before the war|date=22 October 2015|work=Business Insider|accessdate=25 October 2015}} ===ISIL offensives and first rebel counterattack=== On 23 October, ISIL launched an attack on the Khanaser-Ethria highway (the main government supply route between Hama and Aleppo), after detonating two [[VBIED]]'s, and captured {{convert|6|km|mi|abbr=off}} of a road. Subsequently, government forces recaptured some parts of it.{{cite web|url=http://www.syriahr.com/en/2015/10/violent-clashes-killed-no-less-than-40-militants-in-aleppo-countryside/|title=Violent clashes killed no less than 40 militants in Aleppo countryside|author=jack|publisher=Syrian Observatory For Human Rights|accessdate=25 October 2015}} The clashes over the next 24 hours left 28 ISIL fighters and 21 soldiers dead. The attack may have been designed to coincide with a rebel offensive in the Aleppo Governate in order to increase its chances of success.{{cite tweet|user=IUCAnalysts|author=IUCA|number=657547319181709312|date=23 October 2015|title=#Syria #Map Strategic Hama – Aleppo loyalist supply road cut by simultaneous attacks from Rebels and IS|accessdate=25 October 2015}} Elsewhere, 24 rebels, including the military leader of the Thwar al-Sham battalions and a commander of the [[Army of Mujahedeen]], were killed in the southern Aleppo countryside,{{cite web|url=http://www.syriahr.com/en/2015/10/more-than-90-is-militants-rebels-and-personnel-in-the-regime-forces-killed-in-the-violent-clashes-in-the-countryside-of-both-aleppo-and-hama/|title=More than 90 IS militants, rebels and personnel in the regime forces killed in the violent clashes in the countryside of both Aleppo and Hama|author=Master|publisher=Syrian Observatory For Human Rights|accessdate=25 October 2015}} while a rebel spokesman claimed that SAA losses of vehicles had reached 21.{{cite web|url=http://www.vocativ.com/news/242954/american-tow-missiles-are-a-game-changer-against-assad/|title=American TOW Missiles Are A Game Changer Against Assad|publisher=|accessdate=25 October 2015|archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20151028081307/http://www.vocativ.com/news/242954/american-tow-missiles-are-a-game-changer-against-assad/|archive-date=28 October 2015|dead-url=yes|df=dmy-all}} At the end of the day, the rebels recaptured al-Hamra village,{{cite web|url=http://www.syriahr.com/en/2015/10/continuous-clashes-on-the-road-between-khanasser-atharayya-and-booby-trapped-vehicle-in-the-vicinity-of-kweris-airbase/|title=Continuous clashes on the road between Khanasser–Atharayya and booby trapped vehicle in the vicinity of Kweris airbase|author=Edward|publisher=Syrian Observatory For Human Rights|accessdate=25 October 2015}} while government forces reportedly recaptured most of the Khanaser-Ethria highway.{{cite web|url=http://www.almasdarnews.com/article/isis-and-jabhat-al-nusra-threaten-the-syrian-armys-main-supply-route-to-aleppo/|title=ISIS and Jabhat Al-Nusra Threaten the Syrian Army's Main Supply Route to Aleppo|author=Leith Fadel|work=Al-Masdar News|accessdate=25 October 2015}} On 24 October, Army sources reported that it had recaptured the western outskirts of Ithriyah, however the main supply route to Aleppo remained cut off.{{cite web|url=http://www.almasdarnews.com/article/breaking-syrian-army-reopens-the-ithriyah-salamiyah-road-in-east-hama-after-defeating-isis/|title=Breaking: Syrian Army Reopens the Ithriyah-Salamiyah Road in East Hama After Defeating ISIS|author=Leith Fadel|work=Al-Masdar News|accessdate=25 October 2015}} That day, a second leader in the Nur al-Din Zanki Movement was killed, while a rebel and NDF commander were wounded.{{cite web|url=http://www.syriahr.com/en/2015/10/leader-in-nur-al-din-zanki-movement-die-in-aleppos-battels-and-attempt-to-assassinate-the-commander-of-ajnad-al-sham/|title=Leader in Nur al-Din Zanki Movement die in Aleppo’s battels and attempt to assassinate the commander of Ajnad al-Sham|author=Edward|publisher=Syrian Observatory For Human Rights|accessdate=25 October 2015}} The number of government fighters killed at the Khanaser-Ethria highway rose to at least 43.{{cite web|url=http://www.syriahr.com/en/2015/10/more-than-43-regimes-soldiers-and-pro-regime-militiamen-killed-in-clashes-on-khanser-aathrayya-road-the-last-48-hours/|title=More than 43 regime’s soldiers and pro-regime militiamen killed in clashes on Khanser – Aathrayya road the last 48 hours|author=Master|publisher=Syrian Observatory For Human Rights|accessdate=25 October 2015}} At the end of the day, ISIL launched an attack on the eastern suburbs of Aleppo city and captured Tal Reeman and Al-Salihiyah, before government fighters could repel their further attacks with the help of Russian airplanes.{{cite web|url=http://www.almasdarnews.com/article/isis-launches-wide-scale-offensive-in-east-aleppo/|title=ISIS Launches Wide-Scale Offensive in East Aleppo|author=Leith Fadel|work=Al-Masdar News|accessdate=25 October 2015}} On 25 October, rebels attacked, captured and eventually lost the strategically important cement plant area on the outskirts of Aleppo's Sheikh Saeed neighborhood after heavy clashes that led to the death of 14 government fighters and 10 rebels.{{cite web|url=http://www.syriahr.com/en/2015/10/at-least-14-ndf-militiamen-killed-in-an-explosion-on-al-ramosah-road-and-the-regime-forces-retake-the-cement-plant/|title=At least 14 NDF militiamen killed in an explosion on al- Ramosah road, and the regime forces retake the cement plant|accessdate=26 October 2015}} Meanwhile, government forces reportedly recaptured two checkpoints along the Khanaser-Ethria highway, before a sandstorm forcibly halted all military operations in Aleppo.{{cite web|url=http://www.almasdarnews.com/article/syrian-army-recovers-several-points-from-isis-amid-the-sandstorm-engulfing-east-hama/|title=Syrian Army Recovers Several Points from ISIS Amid the Sandstorm Engulfing East Hama|author=Leith Fadel|work=Al-Masdar news|accessdate=26 October 2015}} According to the SOHR, ISIL was still in control of parts of the highway, blocking the main supply route to Aleppo. On 26 October, ISIL re-attacked the Khanaser-Ethria highway and captured a checkpoint, killing eight government fighters. Meanwhile, rebels recaptured Tell Hamiriyyeh hill and the Khalsa farms in the southern Aleppo countryside.{{cite web|url=http://www.syriahr.com/en/2015/10/the-islamic-state-starts-new-attack-on-khanasser-athrayya-road-control-a-checkpoint-and-kill-8-regime-members/|title=The "Islamic State" starts new attack on Khanasser–Athrayya road, control a checkpoint and kill 8 regime members|author=Edward|publisher=Syrian Observatory For Human Rights}} The next day, ISIL also attacked the strategical town of As-Safira in southeastern Aleppo after detonating four VBIED's in the area. ISIL captured "key" military positions near the town and managed to enter Tel Aran.{{cite web|url=http://aranews.net/2015/10/isis-advances-in-eastern-aleppo-after-clashes-with-syrian-forces/|title=ISIS advances in eastern Aleppo after clashes with Syrian forces|publisher=ARA News}} ISIL also managed to enter the northern district of As-Safira, but were pushed out with the help of reinforcements.{{cite web|url=http://www.almasdarnews.com/article/massive-isis-offensive-in-east-aleppo-stalls-as-the-syrian-army-completely-recovers-al-safira/|title=Massive ISIS Offensive in East Aleppo Stalls as the Syrian Army Completely Recovers Al-Safira|author=Leith Fadel|work=Al-Masdar News|accessdate=1 November 2015}}{{cite tweet|user=ejmalrai|author=Elijah J. Magnier|number=659087879281463298|date=27 October 2015|title=#SAA repelled the attack on Sfeiyra despite #ISIS huge attack today.|accessdate=1 November 2015}} Later that day, government forces regained their positions in the al-Safira area.{{cite web|url=http://www.syriahr.com/en/2015/10/russian-airstrikes-target-a-headquarter-and-kill-2-fighters-in-northern-countryside-of-aleppo-and-the-clashes-continue/|title=Russian airstrikes target a headquarter and kill 2 fighters in northern countryside of Aleppo and the clashes continue|author=Edward|publisher=Syrian Observatory For Human Rights|accessdate=1 November 2015}} On 28 October, Russian airstrikes bombed a rebel headquarters in the Aleppo countryside and killed at least 7 rebels. ===Renewed Syrian government advance=== On 30 October, Syrian government forces recaptured the Tal Ithriya hill near the Khanaser–Ethria highway{{cite web|url=http://www.syriahr.com/en/2015/10/the-regime-forces-advance-in-the-eastern-countryside-of-hama-and-warplanes-hit-al-hara-area-in-daraa/|title=The regime forces advance in the eastern countryside of Hama, and warplanes hit al- Hara area in Daraa|author=Master|publisher=Syrian Observatory For Human Rights|accessdate=1 November 2015}}{{cite web|url=http://www.almasdarnews.com/article/hezbollah-and-the-syrian-army-capture-tal-ithriyah-isis-controls-1km-of-highway-in-east-hama/|title=Hezbollah and the Syrian Army Capture Tal Ithriyah: ISIS Controls 1 km of Highway in East Hama|author=Leith Fadel|work=Al-Masdar News|accessdate=1 November 2015}} and repelled ISIL at Sheikh Hilal and Al-Sa’an. According to the same sources, the SAA also conducted an operation near the town of Khan Touman and captured farms located between the towns of Khan Touman and Qarassi in southern Aleppo.{{cite web|url=http://www.almasdarnews.com/article/breaking-syrian-army-and-hezbollah-advance-to-khan-touman-in-southern-aleppo/|title=Breaking: Syrian Army and Hezbollah Advance to Khan Touman in Southern Aleppo|author=Leith Fadel|work=Al-Masdar News|accessdate=1 November 2015}} Between 31 October and 2 November, the SAA and its allies captured six villages in the southern countryside of Aleppo, as the rebels withdrew to their stronghold at [[Al-Hadher, Syria|Al-Hadher]]. A rebel counter-attack was reportedly unsuccessful.{{cite web|url=http://www.syriahr.com/en/2015/11/human-losses-in-is-and-regime-forces-during-clashes-in-aleppo/|title=Human losses in IS and regime forces during clashes in Aleppo|author=jack|publisher=Syrian Observatory For Human Rights}}{{cite web|url=http://www.almasdarnews.com/article/breaking-syrian-army-and-hezbollah-capture-jamaymah-and-maryameen-in-southern-aleppo/|title=Breaking: Syrian Army and Hezbollah Capture Jamaymah and Maryameen in Southern Aleppo|author=Leith Fadel|work=Al-Masdar News|accessdate=1 November 2015}}{{cite web|url=http://www.almasdarnews.com/article/syrian-army-and-hezbollah-continue-to-roll-in-southern-aleppo-2-more-villages-captured/|title=Syrian Army and Hezbollah Continue to Roll in Southern Aleppo: 2 more Villages Captured|author=Leith Fadel|work=Al-Masdar News}}{{cite web|url=http://www.almasdarnews.com/article/syrian-army-and-hezbollah-make-huge-gains-in-southern-aleppo-military-operations-begin-in-al-hadher/|title=Syrian Army and Hezbollah Make Huge Gains in Southern Aleppo: Military Operations Begin in Al-Hadher|author=Leith Fadel|work=Al-Masdar News}} On 2 November, ISIL captured the village of Ta’anah and its hill from Syrian troops,{{cite web|url=http://www.syriahr.com/en/2015/11/violent-clashes-take-place-in-the-countryside-of-aleppo-while-warplanes-attack-the-village-of-harbel/|title=Violent clashes take place in the countryside of Aleppo, while warplanes attack the village of Harbel|author=Master|publisher=Syrian Observatory For Human Rights}} while the rebels reportedly recaptured "wide parts" of Jabal al-Banjira.{{cite web|url=http://www.syriahr.com/en/2015/11/the-rebel-and-islamist-factions-re-advance-in-al-banjira-in-the-southern-countryside-of-aleppo-and-intense-airstrikes-carried-out-on-the-eastern-countryside/|title=The rebel and Islamist factions re-advance in al- Banjira in the southern countryside of Aleppo, and intense airstrikes carried out on the eastern countryside|author=Master|publisher=Syrian Observatory For Human Rights}} The next day, government forces recaptured Al-Ta’anah.{{cite web|url=http://www.almasdarnews.com/article/isis-storms-tal-arn-in-east-aleppo-while-the-syrian-army-recaptures-al-taanah-in-the-north/|title=ISIS Storms Tal 'Arn in East Aleppo While the Syrian Army Recaptures Al-Ta'anah in the North|author=Leith Fadel|work=Al-Masdar News}} [[File:Northwestern Syria & Aleppo offensives 2015.svg|thumb|Wider strategic view, including the [[Northwestern Syria offensive (October–November 2015)|North–western Syria offensive]].]] On 4 November, government troops regained control over the Khanasser–Ithriya Highway after twelve days of clashes with ISIL, killing seven fighters, four through beheading.{{cite web|url=http://www.syriahr.com/en/2015/11/the-regime-forces-kill-7-isis-members-and-behead-4-of-them-in-khanasser-athrayya-road/|title=The regime forces kill 7 ISIS members and behead 4 of them in Khanasser-Athrayya road|author=Edward|publisher=Syrian Observatory For Human Rights}} While retreating towards al-Tabbaqa, a huge ISIS convoy was reportedly struck by Russian aircraft; the number of dead reported in the attack was more than 50.{{cite web|url=http://www.dailystar.com.lb/News/Middle-East/2015/Nov-04/321563-syria-army-reopens-road-to-govt-held-parts-of-aleppo.ashx|title=Syrian army regains control of Aleppo supply route|work=The Daily Star Newspaper – Lebanon}} On 5 November, rebels recaptured two villages but despite this, the Army captured the town of Kafr Haddad.{{cite web|url=https://www.reuters.com/article/2015/11/05/us-mideast-crisis-syria-idUSKCN0SU0XY20151105#OUOYsmpcDK3wmZbr.97|title=Syrian rebels seize town in west in blow to government|publisher=Reuters}}{{cite web|url=http://www.almasdarnews.com/article/breaking-syrian-army-and-hezbollah-capture-kafr-haddad-in-northeastern-idlib/|title=Breaking: Syrian Army and Hezbollah Capture Kafr Haddad in Northeastern Idlib|author=Leith Fadel|work=Al-Masdar News|accessdate=17 November 2015}}{{cite web|url=http://www.syriahr.com/en/2015/11/clashes-continue-in-the-southern-countryside-of-aleppo-and-airstrikes-on-the-city-and-northern-countryside/|title=Clashes continue in the southern countryside of Aleppo and airstrikes on the city and northern countryside|author=Edward|publisher=Syrian Observatory For Human Rights|accessdate=17 November 2015}} On 8 November, government forces captured three villages positioned directly south of Al-Hadhir, two of which the rebels retook the next day.{{cite web|url=http://www.almasdarnews.com/article/breaking-syrian-army-and-hezbollah-capture-tal-mamou-and-aziziyah-in-southern-aleppo/|title=Breaking: Syrian Army and Hezbollah Capture Tal Mamou and 'Aziziyah in Southern Aleppo|author=Leith Fadel|work=Al-Masdar News|accessdate=17 November 2015}}{{cite web|url=http://www.syriahr.com/en/2015/11/clashes-continue-in-aleppo-between-is-and-regime-forces/|title=Clashes continue in Aleppo between IS and regime forces|author=jack|publisher=Syrian Observatory For Human Rights|accessdate=17 November 2015}} The SAA re-took one of them on 10 November,{{cite web|url=http://www.almasdarnews.com/article/syrian-army-and-hezbollah-flank-the-rebel-stronghold-of-al-hadher-in-southern-aleppo/|title=Syrian Army and Hezbollah Flank the Rebel Stronghold of Al-Hadher in Southern Aleppo|author=Leith Fadel|work=Al-Masdar News|accessdate=17 November 2015}} as well as a further three.{{cite web|url=http://www.almasdarnews.com/article/breaking-syrian-army-and-hezbollah-capture-makahlah-in-southern-aleppo/|title=Breaking: Syrian Army and Hezbollah Capture Makahlah in Southern Aleppo|author=Leith Fadel|work=Al-Masdar News|accessdate=17 November 2015}}{{cite web|url=http://www.syriahr.com/en/2015/11/the-regime-forces-advance-in-the-southern-countryside-of-aleppo-and-clashes-take-place-in-the-southeast-of-homs/|title=The regime forces advance in the southern countryside of Aleppo, and clashes take place in the south-east of Homs|author=Master|publisher=Syrian Observatory For Human Rights|accessdate=17 November 2015}} {{anchor|Al-Hadher, Syria}}By the end of 11 November, the rebels recaptured several areas,{{cite web|url=http://www.syriahr.com/en/2015/11/the-violent-clashes-still-taking-place-in-the-vicinity-of-kwayres-airbase-while-the-factions-advance-in-the-southern-countryside-of-aleppo/|title=The violent clashes continue in the vicinity of Kwayres airbase, while the factions advance in the southern countryside of Aleppo|author=Master|publisher=Syrian Observatory For Human Rights|accessdate=17 November 2015}}{{cite web|url=http://www.syriahr.com/en/2015/11/the-factions-continue-to-advance-in-the-southern-countryside-of-aleppo/|title=The factions continue to advance in the southern countryside of Aleppo|author=Master|publisher=Syrian Observatory For Human Rights|accessdate=17 November 2015}} but the military continued its advances on 12 November with the capture of five more villages,{{cite web|url=http://www.almasdarnews.com/article/breaking-syrian-army-and-hezbollah-capture-2-villages-in-southern-aleppo/|title=Breaking: Syrian Army and Hezbollah Capture 2 Villages in Southern Aleppo|author=Leith Fadel|work=Al-Masdar News|accessdate=17 November 2015}}{{cite web|url=http://www.syriahr.com/en/2015/11/destroying-armored-vehicle-for-the-regime-forces-in-a-counter-attack-by-the-factions-in-the-southern-countryside-of-aleppo-and-clashes-in-the-eastern-countryside-of-aleppo/|title=Destroying armored vehicle for the regime forces in a counter attack by the factions in the southern countryside of Aleppo and clashes in the eastern countryside of Aleppo|author=Edward|publisher=Syrian Observatory For Human Rights|accessdate=17 November 2015}}{{cite web|url=http://www.syriahr.com/?p=143149|title=حزب الله اللبناني وقوات النظام يسيطران على بلدة العيس ويبسطان سيطرة نارية على ريف حلب الجنوبي ومعارك مستمرة قرب مطار كويرس|author=edward|work=المرصد السورى لحقوق الإنسان}}{{cite web|url=http://www.almasdarnews.com/article/syrian-army-and-hezbollah-sweep-through-southern-aleppo-islamist-rebels-suffer-massive-defeat/|title=Syrian Army and Hezbollah Sweep Through Southern Aleppo: Islamist Rebels Suffer Massive Defeat|author=Leith Fadel|work=Al-Masdar News|accessdate=17 November 2015}} as well as the key rebel town of Al-Hader.{{cite web|url=https://www.facebook.com/photo.php?fbid=565453380268382|title=Timeline Photos - وكالة قاسيون للأنباء - Qasion News Agency – Facebook|publisher=|accessdate=17 November 2015}} {{anchor|Birnah}} On 13 November, government forces captured four villages and a hill, thus taking control of {{convert|341|sqkm|abbr=on}} of territory.{{cite web|url=http://www.almasdarnews.com/article/syrian-army-and-hezbollah-capture-several-villages-in-southern-aleppo-en-route-to-cutting-off-the-m-5-highway/|title=Syrian Army and Hezbollah Capture Several Villages in Southern Aleppo En Route to Cutting Off the M-5 Highway|author=Leith Fadel|work=Al-Masdar News|accessdate=17 November 2015}}{{cite web|url=http://www.almasdarnews.com/article/islamist-rebel-defenses-collapsing-in-southern-aleppo-two-more-villages-captuted-by-the-syrian-army-and-hezbollah/|title=Islamist Rebel Defenses Collapsing in Southern Aleppo: Two More Villages Captured by the Syrian Army and Hezbollah|author=Leith Fadel|work=Al-Masdar News|accessdate=17 November 2015}}{{cite web|url=http://www.almasdarnews.com/article/breaking-syrian-army-and-hezbollah-officially-capture-the-strategic-town-of-jabal-al-eiss-in-southern-aleppo/|title=Breaking: Syrian Army and Hezbollah Officially Capture the Strategic Town of Jabal Al-Eiss in Southern Aleppo|author=Leith Fadel|work=Al-Masdar News|accessdate=17 November 2015}} By the end of the day, they broke through to the west, capturing two villages and the [[International Center for Agricultural Research in the Dry Areas|ICARDA base]], adjacent to the Idlib–Aleppo highway, cutting the road.{{cite web|url=http://english.ahram.org.eg/NewsContent/2/8/166436/World/Region/Syrian-army-captures-village-in-Aleppo-province-Mo.aspx|title=Syrian army captures village in Aleppo province: Monitor, state TV|publisher=|accessdate=17 November 2015}}{{cite web|url=https://news.yahoo.com/syrian-army-captures-village-aleppo-province-monitor-state-113912327.html|title=Syrian army captures village in Aleppo province: monitor, state TV|date=13 November 2015|publisher=Yahoo News|accessdate=17 November 2015}}{{cite web|url=http://www.syriahr.com/?p=143220|title=قصف مكثف على ريف حلب الجنوبي ومعارك عنيفة تشهدها المنطقة|author=khaled|work=المرصد السورى لحقوق الإنسان|accessdate=17 November 2015}}{{cite web|url=https://www.facebook.com/LCCSy/posts/1259444277416039|title=#حلب قوات الأسد تسيطر على قرى #بانص و... - لجان التنسيق المحلية في سوريا - Facebook|publisher=|accessdate=17 November 2015}}{{cite web|url=http://www.syriahr.com/en/2015/11/intense-shelling-on-the-southern-countryside-of-aleppo-while-violent-clashes-erupt-in-the-area/|title=Intense shelling on the southern countryside of Aleppo, while violent clashes erupt in the area|author=Master|publisher=Syrian Observatory For Human Rights|accessdate=17 November 2015}}{{cite web|url=http://www.syriahr.com/en/2015/11/the-regime-forces-continue-to-advance-towards-the-northeastern-countryside-of-idlib-and-the-southeastern-countryside-of-aleppo-seizing-new-areas/|title=The regime forces continue to advance towards the northeastern countryside of Idlib and the southeastern countryside of Aleppo seizing new areas|author=Master|publisher=Syrian Observatory For Human Rights|accessdate=17 November 2015}}{{cite web|url=https://www.syriahr.com/?p=143228|title=قوات النظام تستمر في تقدمها باتجاه ريف إدلب الشمالي الشرقي وريف حلب الجنوبي الشرقي وتسيطر على مزيد من المناطق|author=edward|work=المرصد السورى لحقوق الإنسان|accessdate=17 November 2015}} On 17 November, government forces captured Khalasah (known as Halash), after they advance from the nearby village Al-Hamraa.{{cite web|url=http://www.almasdarnews.com/article/syrian-army-and-hezbollah-capture-halash-in-southern-aleppo/|title=Syrian Army and Hezbollah Capture Halash in Southern Aleppo|author=Leith Fadel|work=Al-Masdar News|accessdate=4 December 2015}} On the next day, rebels recaptured the Banes farms.{{cite web|url=http://www.syriahr.com/en/2015/11/unidentified-people-kill-the-commander-of-an-islamic-brigade-at-the-outskirts-of-aleppo-city-and-clashes-in-the-southern-countryside/|title=Unidentified people kill the commander of an Islamic Brigade at the outskirts of Aleppo city and clashes in the southern countryside|author=Edward|publisher=Syrian Observatory For Human Rights|accessdate=4 December 2015}}{{cite web|url=http://en.eldorar.com/node/713|title=Rebel factions to regain new military points of the southern countryside in Aleppo|work=Eldorar Alshamia|accessdate=4 December 2015}} {{anchor|Burj Al-Rumman}} On 20 November, government troops captured Burj Al-Rumman and advanced to the village of Al-‘Umariyah, to the south-west of Al-Safira.{{cite web|url=http://www.almasdarnews.com/article/syrian-army-and-hezbollah-capture-the-village-of-burj-al-rouman-in-southern-aleppo/|title=Syrian Army and Hezbollah Capture the Village of Burj Al-Rouman in Southern Aleppo|author=Leith Fadel|work=Al-Masdar News|accessdate=4 December 2015}} At this point, the military halted their offensive, in expectation of the arrival of new [[T-90]] tanks, which would come by the end of the month.{{cite web|url=http://www.almasdarnews.com/article/syrian-army-recs/|title=Russian Advanced T-90 Tanks Arrive in Southern Aleppo to Resume the Syrian Army Offensive|author=Leith Fadel|work=Al-Masdar News|accessdate=4 December 2015}} ===Second rebel counterattack=== {{anchor|Zorba}}{{anchor|ICARDA}}On 21 November, rebels launched a counter-offensive at [[Al-Eiss|Tal al-Eiss]],{{cite web|url=http://www.almasdarnews.com/article/islamist-rebels-launch-counter-offensive-at-tal-al-eiss-in-southern-aleppo/|title=Islamist Rebels Launch Counter-Offensive at Tal Al-Eiss in Southern Aleppo|author=Leith Fadel|work=Al-Masdar News|accessdate=4 December 2015}} {{anchor|Kafr Haddad}}{{anchor|Tal Mamou}}{{anchor|Al-Makalah}}By 23 November, the rebels recaptured seven villages and two hills.{{cite web|url=http://www.almasdarnews.com/article/islamist-rebels-capture-several-hilltops-in-southern-aleppo/|title=Islamist Rebels Capture Several Sites in Southern Aleppo|author=Leith Fadel|work=Al-Masdar News|accessdate=4 December 2015}} Al-Nusra seized a number of US-made Humvees from Shia militia near Tal Mamou.{{Cite web|title = Al Nusrah Front fights Iraqi militia in Aleppo|url=http://www.longwarjournal.org/archives/2015/11/al-nusrah-front-fights-iraqi-militia-in-aleppo.php|website=The Long War Journal|accessdate = 29 November 2015}} {{anchor|al-Maryoudah}}On 28 November, the rebels recaptured al-Maryoudah village.{{cite web|url=http://www.syriahr.com/en/2015/11/the-regime-forces-regain-control-of-two-villages-in-the-eastern-countryside-of-aleppo-and-dozens-wounded-in-bombing-by-the-factions-on-sheikh-maksoud-neighborhood/ |title=The regime forces regain control of two villages in the eastern countryside of Aleppo and dozens wounded in bombing by the factions on Sheikh Maksoud neighborhood |author=Edward |publisher=Syrian Observatory For Human Rights |accessdate=4 December 2015 |deadurl=yes |archiveurl=https://web.archive.org/web/20151208171455/http://www.syriahr.com/en/2015/11/the-regime-forces-regain-control-of-two-villages-in-the-eastern-countryside-of-aleppo-and-dozens-wounded-in-bombing-by-the-factions-on-sheikh-maksoud-neighborhood/ |archivedate=8 December 2015}} However, by 29 November, the rebel assault on the southern perimeter of the village Al-Aziziyah failed from their positions at village Al-Makalah, and they withdrew to the south in order to evade air assaults from the Russian and Syrian Air Forces.{{cite web|url=http://www.almasdarnews.com/article/over-50-islamist-rebels-killed-in-the-failed-bid-to-capture-al-aziziyah-in-southern-aleppo/|title=Over 50 Islamist Rebels Killed in the Failed Bid to Capture Al-Aziziyah in Southern Aleppo|author=Leith Fadel|work=Al-Masdar News|accessdate=4 December 2015}}{{cite web|url=http://www.syriahr.com/?p=144914|title=25 شهيداً وجريحاً عل الأقل في قصف للفصائل على أحياء بمدينة حلب وخسائر بشرية في اشتباكات بمحيط كشتعار|author=edward|work=المرصد السورى لحقوق الإنسان|accessdate=4 December 2015}} ===Syrian Army captures Khan Touman=== {{anchor|Tall web|url=http://www.syriahr.com/?p=145211|title= معارك عنيفة في ريف حلب الجنوبي وعشرات الضربات الجوية تستهدف مدينة تدمر|author=Jack|work=المرصد السورى لحقوق الإنسان|accessdate=4 December 2015}}{{cite December 2015}}{{cite web|url=https://www.facebook.com/LCCSy/posts/1270221849671615|title=#حلب قوات الأسد تستعيد السيطره على... - لجان التنسيق المحلية في سوريا - Facebook|publisher=|accessdate=4 Aleppo|author=Leith Fadel|work=Al-Masdar News|accessdate=10 December 2015}}{{cite web|url=http://www.almasdarnews.com/article/hezbollah-captures-baradah-village-in-southern-aleppo/|title=Hezbollah and Fadel|work=Al-Masdar News|accessdate=10 December 2015}}{{cite tweet|user=24Aleppo|author=Aleppo24|number=673849953958146048|date=7 December 2015|title=بعد سيطرتها على قرى الحمراء وخلصة وزيتان بريف Banes,{{cite web|url=http://www.syriahr.com/2015/12/اشتباكات-عنيفة-في-عدة-محاور-بريف-حلب-ال/|title=اشتباكات عنيفة في عدة محاور بريف حلب الجنوبي وقوات النظام تحاول السيطرة على بلدة Struggles to Maintain Ground], Almasdar.com, 9 December 2015 the same day that government sources announced a third phase of the Southern Aleppo Offensive.{{cite web|url=http://www.almasdarnews.com/article/3rd-phase-of-the-southern-aleppo-offensive-begins-aleppo-damascus-highway-is-the-objective/|title=3rd Phase of the Southern Aleppo Offensive Begins: Aleppo-Damascus Highway is the Objective|author=Leith Fadel|work=Al-Masdar News|accessdate=10 December 2015}} {{anchor|Abu Ruwayl}}{{anchor|Sa'ibiyah}}{{anchor|Murayqis}}{{anchor|Dulamah}}{{anchor|Qurayhah}}{{anchor|Al Sahibiya}}{{anchor|Banes}}Between 12 and 13 December, government forces captured up to seven villages.{{cite web|url=http://www.almasdarnews.com/article/syrian-army-and-hezbollah-capture-3-villages-in-southern-aleppo/|title=Syrian Army and Hezbollah Capture 3 Villages in Southern Aleppo|author=Leith Fadel|work=Al-Masdar News|accessdate=23 December 2015}}[http://www.syriahr.com/2015/12/تقدم-لقوات-النظام-في-قرى-بريف-حلب-الجنو/ تقدم لقوات النظام في قرى بريف حلب الجنوبي وغارات على ريفيها الغربي والشمالي]{{cite web|url=https://www.facebook.com/www.documents.sy/posts/861524090613531|title=#سوريا #حلب نشرت مصادر خرائط ميدانية... - المركز السوري للتوثيق - Facebook|publisher=|accessdate=23 December 2015}}{{cite web|url=http://fna.ir/3Z60B1|title=اختصاصی/|publisher=|accessdate=23 December 2015}}{{Dead link|date=October 2018 |bot=InternetArchiveBot |fix-attempted=yes }}{{Cite web|title=Jabhat Al-Nusra Captures Banes in Southern Aleppo Amid the Hezbollah Advance at Khan Touman|url=http://www.almasdarnews.com/article/jabhat-al-nusra-captures-banes-southern-aleppo-amid-hezbollah-advance-khan-touman/|website=Al-Masdar News|accessdate=16 December 2015|language=en-US}} {{anchor|Al-Qarassi}}{{anchor|Al 'Amarah}}{{anchor|Khan Tuman}}{{anchor|Marath}}{{anchor|Tell Marath}}On 20 December, the Syrian Army captured the strategic town of [[Khan Tuman]], as well as two nearby villages, several hills and the Khan Touman Ammunition Depot, along the Aleppo-Damascus Highway (M-5 Highway), cutting the primary rebel supply route from the provincial capital of the Idlib province toward the provincial capital of the Aleppo province.{{cite web|url=http://www.almasdarnews.com/article/hezbollah-syrian-army-cutoff-the-aleppo-damascus-highway-after-seizing-khan-touman-in-southern-aleppo/|title=Hezbollah, Syrian Army cutoff the Aleppo-Damascus Highway after seizing Khan Touman in southern Aleppo|author=Leith Fadel|work=Al-Masdar News|accessdate=23 December 2015}}{{cite web|url=http://www.syriahr.com/en/?p=40727|title=Regime forces and Hezbollah take control on Khan Toman strategic town|author=jack|publisher=Syrian Observatory For Human Rights|accessdate=23 December 2015}}{{cite web|url=http://www.syriahr.com/?p=147227|title=قوات النظام تتقدم نحو مستودعات خان طومان بريف حلب الجنوبي و40 غارة على الأقل تستهدف المنطقة مع اشتباكات عنيفة ومتواصلة|author=khaled|work=المرصد السورى لحقوق الإنسان}}{{cite web|url=http://www.almasdarnews.com/article/breaking-syrian-army-hezbollah-capture-the-strategic-village-of-al-qarassi-in-southern-aleppo/|title=Breaking: Syrian Army, Hezbollah capture the strategic village of Al-Qarassi in southern Aleppo|author=Leith Fadel|work=Al-Masdar News|accessdate=23 December 2015}}{{cite web|url=http://www.almasdarnews.com/article/t-90-tanks-help-propel-hezbollah-and-the-syrian-army-in-southern-aleppo/|title=T-90 tanks help propel Hezbollah and the Syrian Army in Southern Aleppo|author=Leith Fadel|work=Al-Masdar News|accessdate=23 December 2015}} The Al-Zarbeh Poultry Farm was also seized.{{cite web|url=http://www.syriahr.com/?p=147263|title=نحو 20 شهيداً وجريحاً في قصف لطائرات حربية على ريف حلب ولواء أحرار سوريا يرفض اتفاقات غرف العمليات مع جيش الثوار والوحدات الكردية|author=edward|work=المرصد السورى لحقوق الإنسان|accessdate=23 December 2015}} On the next day, government forces advanced further around Khan Tuman, taking control of two villages and two hills.{{cite web|url=http://www.farsnews.com/newstext.php?nn=13940930000791|title=/اختصاصی فارس/|publisher=|accessdate=23 December 2015}}{{cite web|url=http://www.syriahr.com/?p=147353|title=استشهاد 3 شقيقات في قذائف استهدفت شارع النيل بمدينة حلب وشهداء وجرحى في قصف جوي على عدة أحياء فيها وتقدم لقوات النظام بريفها الجنوبي|author=khaled|work=المرصد السورى لحقوق الإنسان|accessdate=23 December 2015}}{{cite web|url=http://www.agathocledesyracuse.com/archives/599|title=Agathocle de Syracuse|publisher=|accessdate=23 December 2015}}{{cite web|url=http://www.syriahr.com/?p=147391|title=قوات النظام تتقدم مجدداً وتسيطر على منطقة جديدة في ريف حلب الجنوبي|author=edward|work=المرصد السورى لحقوق الإنسان|accessdate=23 December 2015}}{{cite tweet|user=HalaJaber|author=Hala Jaber|number=678930808015601664|date=21 December 2015|title=.3/ Reports that #SAA & #Hezbollah allies have retaken strategic #al_Ajami hill in south #Aleppo Reef after #Khan_Touman.|accessdate=23 December 2015}} ==Aftermath== {{anchor|Taloul Hazzim}}{{anchor|Murtafa’ Al-Zeitoun}}{{anchor|Blouzah}} On 11 January 2016, Syrian government forces launched an assault on the town of Al-Rashiddeen, to the southwest of Aleppo city, while also reportedly capturing two villages in Aleppo's southern countryside.{{cite web|url=http://www.almasdarnews.com/article/syrian-army-advances-in-southern-and-western-aleppo-amid-the-rebel-collapse/|title=Syrian Army advances in southern and western Aleppo|author=Leith Fadel|date=11 January 2016|work=Al-Masdar News}} On 28 January, they also seized the village of Blouzah.{{cite web|url=http://www.almasdarnews.com/article/syrian-army-captures-balouzah-in-southern-aleppo/|title=Syrian Army captures Balouzah in southern Aleppo|author=Leith Fadel|date=28 January 2016|work=Al-Masdar News}} On 3 February, the rebels recaptured the village of Al-Khalidiyah, near Khan Touman, thus reopening their supply line via the Aleppo-Damascus Highway (M-5 Highway).{{cite web|url=http://www.almasdarnews.com/article/islamist-rebels-reopen-southern-aleppo-supply-line-seizing-al-khalidiyah/|title=Islamist rebels reopen southern Aleppo supply line after seizing Al-Khalidiyah|author=Leith Fadel|date=4 February 2016|work=Al-Masdar News}} However, it was reported government troops recaptured Al-Khalidiyah three days later.{{cite web|url=http://www.almasdarnews.com/article/syrian-army-recaptured-al-khalidiyah-in-southern-aleppo/|title=Syrian Army recaptures Al-Khalidiyah in southern Aleppo|author=Leith Fadel|date=7 February 2016|work=Al-Masdar News}} ==Strategic analysis== Christopher Kozak of the [[Institute for the Study of War]] speculated that the assault was nothing more than a diversionary [[Military tactics|tactic]] intended to move rebel forces away from reopening the access to the Shi'ite towns of Nubl and al-Zahraa and cut the Aleppo–Turkey highway, their primary objective in his opinion. The Syrian Army eventually launched [[Northern Aleppo offensive (2016)|an offensive]] in Northern Aleppo on 1 February 2016 and broke the three-year [[Siege of Nubl and Al-Zahraa|siege of the two towns]], effectively cutting the Aleppo–Turkey supply route.{{cite web|url=http://www.aljazeera.com/news/2016/02/syrian-army-encircles-aleppo-ceasefire-talks-fade-160203033045269.html|title=Syrian army encircles Aleppo as ceasefire talks fade|publisher=Al Jazeera}} Hezbollah's main incentive in participating in the offensive is believed to be similar to their agenda elsewhere, securing Shi'ite villages. Their ultimate objective is believed to be reaching the villages of [[Kafriya]] and [[Al-Fu'ah]], thus lifting the siege imposed by [[Al-Nusra Front]].{{cite web|url=http://www.almasdarnews.com/article/hezbollah-determined-to-reach-al-fouaa-and-kafraya-in-idlib-17km-to-go/|title=Hezbollah Determined to Reach Al-Fou'aa and Kafraya in Idlib: 17 km to go|author=Leith Fadel|work=Al-Masdar News|accessdate=17 November 2015}} With reportedly hundreds of square kilometers brought under government control within the span of the first month of the offensive, Al-Masdar concluded that the overall effectiveness of both the senior Iranian revolutionary guards on the ground as well as the close Russian air-support have been noted as part of the main array of factors leading to a revitalized advance by government forces.{{cite web|url=http://www.almasdarnews.com/article/syrian-army-and-hezbollah-capture-over-210km-of-territory-in-southern-aleppo/|title=Syrian Army and Hezbollah Capture Over 210 km of Territory in Southern Aleppo|author=Leith Fadel|work=Al-Masdar News}}{{cite web|url=http://www.almasdarnews.com/article/syrian-army-and-hezbollah-advance-in-southern-aleppo-as-the-islamist-rebels-struggle-to-halt-the-onslaught/|title=Syrian Army and Hezbollah Advance in Southern Aleppo as the Islamist Rebels Struggle to Halt the Onslaught|author=Leith Fadel|work=Al-Masdar News|accessdate=10 December 2015}} The son of [[Abdullah Azzam]], Huthaifa Azzam, demanded mobilization for Aleppo.{{cite tweet|user=AzzamHuthaifa|author=د.حذيفة عبدالله عزام|number=660781582383497216|date=1 November 2015|title=10-ونجمع الجهود ونحشد للحفاظ على حلب من السقوط وقد حشد العدو لها من كل حدب وصوب وكنا ندعو الله لهم بين يوفقهم وينصرهم في معركة حماة لم نجد|accessdate= }} ==See also== {{Portal|Syrian Civil War}} * [[Battle of Aleppo (2012–2016)]] * [[Kuweires offensive (September–November 2015)]] * [[East Aleppo offensive (2015–16)]] * [[Northern Aleppo offensive (2016)]] ==References== {{Reflist|30em}} {{Syrian Civil War}} {{DEFAULTSORT:Aleppo offensive (October-December 2015)}} [[Category:Military operations of the Syrian Civil War in 2015]] [[Category:Aleppo in the Syrian Civil War]] [[Category:Aleppo Governorate in the Syrian Civil War]] {{Coord|32|42|22.60|N|117|09|42.63|W|region:US-CA_type:event|display=title}} {{Infobox Convention |name = AsiaPOP Comic Convention |image = [[File:Asia Pop Comic Convention Logo.png|160px]] |caption = AsiaPOP Comic Convention logo |status = Active |genre = Multi Genre |venue = [[SMX Convention Center]] (main)
[[Metro Manila]] (various) |location = [[Metro Manila]] |country = [[Philippines]] |first = {{start date and age|2015|9|17}} |organizer = Universal Events & Entertainment |website = {{url|https://asiapopcomicon.com/manila/}} }} '''AsiaPOP Comic Convention''', also known as '''AsiaPOP Comicon''', or simply '''APCC''', is an annual [[comic book]] [[fan convention]] held in [[Metro Manila]], Philippines. APCC features international brands in the fields of comics, toys, animation, film, television and music within the [[popular culture|pop culture]] phenomena. The convention has since included a larger range of pop culture and entertainment elements across virtually all genres, such as video games, books and sports.{{cite news|last1=Desiderio|first1=Louella|title=Asia Pop Comic Con 2015 set in Manila|url=http://www.philstar.com/business/2014/11/27/1396157/asia-pop-comic-con-2015-set-manila|accessdate=August 17, 2016|work=[[The Philippine Star]]|date=November 27, 2014}} APCC is the largest pop culture convention in the [[Philippines]]http://insights.looloo.com/metro-manila-conventions-for-every-kind-of-geek/ and South East Asia, and one of the largest in Asia.https://www.clickthecity.com/events/details.php?id=32753 ==Organization== [[Comics in the Philippines|Comic books in the Philippines]], locally known as ''komiks'' have been widespread and popular throughout the country.[http://www.allphilippines.com/?paged=4 "Filipino Artist Tony Velasquez – Founding Father of Philippine Komiks (Comics),"] AllPhilippines.com. The first indigenous cartoons may be traced to [[José Rizal]]'s illustration of the fable, "[[The Tortoise and the Monkey]]" (1885), but it was in the 1920s, ''[[Liwayway]]'' magazine began running comic strips under the direction of [[Romualdo Ramos]] and [[Tony Velasquez]], such as the still-running ''Mga Kabalbalan ni Kenkoy'' ([[The Misadventures of Kenkoy]]). Valasquez is considered the father of Filipino comics. With various local talents gaining recognition abroad, comic books remain popular and widespread as Filipinos enjoy a wide range of selection of comic books from the local industry to mainstream western comics and Japanese manga.{{cite web|url=http://www.comicscube.com/2011/08/filipino-komiks-and-history.html|title=Filipino Komiks and History|website=www.comicscube.com}} APCC is organized by Universal Events & Entertainment, a subsidiary of the Al Ahli Holding Group.{{cite web|url=https://asiapopcomicon.com/manila/aboutUs|title=AsiaPop Comicon Manila 2017|first=AsiaPop Comicon Manila|last=2017|website=asiapopcomicon.com}} The inaugural Asia Pop Comic Convention was held from September 17 to 20 at the [[World Trade Center Metro Manila]] in Pasay with various big names cosplayers, artists and other entertainers both local and international were featured.{{cite web|url=http://news.abs-cbn.com/life/08/25/16/why-organizers-chose-ph-to-host-asiapop-comicon|title=Why organizers chose PH to host AsiaPOP Comicon|first=ABS-CBN|last=News|publisher=}} Universal Events & Entertainment introduced APCC in the [[United Arab Emirates]] (known as Pop Con Dubai){{cite web|url=http://gulfnews.com/guides/going-out/events/popcon-dubai-your-ultimate-guide-to-all-the-action-1.1918696|title=PopCon Dubai: Your ultimate guide to all the action|first=David Tusing, Deputy tabloid!|last=Editor|date=25 October 2016|publisher=}} and will introduce one in [[South Korea]] both acting as sister conventions to the Manila convention. ==Events== Like most comic-book conventions,APCC features a large floor-space for exhibitors. These include media companies such as movie studios and TV networks, as well as comic-book dealers and collectibles merchants. Also included are autograph areas like the Walk of Fame where invited guest can sign autographs and sell or do free sketches.There are areas for sales of merchandises from clothing, toys, gadgets and other souvenirs. Creative Circle (used to be known as Artists' Alley) is for budding or independent artist and talents to sell their works to the public and also serve as a platform to showcase their talents to potential companies. APCC also offers panels, seminars and workshops with comic book professionals. Meet and greet panels are also available for different celebrity guests.{{cite web|url=https://pop.inquirer.net/2016/08/ten-ways-to-catch-all-the-awesomeness-at-the-asiapop-comiccon-manila-2016/|title=Ten ways to catch all the awesomeness at the AsiaPOP Comicon Manila 2016 - InqPOP!|date=25 August 2016|publisher=}} Since its inauguration, Cosplay Authority Global Challenge, or CAGE conducts cosplay competitions.{{cite web|url=http://www.movienewsguide.com/asiapop-comicon-manila-cage-biggest-cosplay-competition/274209|title=AsiaPOP Comicon Manila 2016: The CAGE Experience|date=4 September 2016|publisher=}} There are also musical performances conducted by various artists. Different stage shows are also conducted ranging from local workshops, conferences, concerts and even wrestling shows. There are previews of upcoming feature films, and portfolio review sessions with top comic book and video game companies. In 2016, [[Marvel Comics|Marvel]] introduced its own panel, Hall M. In the same year, eSports have been introduced to the event.{{cite web|url=http://www.scoutmag.ph/section/events/asia-pop-comic-con-2016/|title=5 Things You Can't Miss In Asia Pop Comic Con 2016 - Scout Magazine|date=26 August 2016|publisher=}} The following year Netflix hosted its own panel which evolved into Hall N. Disney followed suit introducing Hall D in 2018. ==History== ===2015=== The inaugural Asia Pop Comic Convention was held from September 17 to 20 at the [[World Trade Center Metro Manila]] in Pasay with various big names cosplayers, artists and other entertainers both local and international were featured. [[Paul Bettany]], who portrays the [[Vision (Marvel Comics)|Vision]] in the ''[[Marvel Cinematic Universe]]'', showcased a ''[[Captain America: Civil War|Civil War]]'' Panel to promote the next installment in the [[Marvel Cinematic Universe]].https://asiapopcomicon.com/manila/guests/celebrity-guests/ [[Nathalie Emmanuel]] who plays [[List of A Song of Ice and Fire characters#Missandei|Missandei]] of ''[[Game of Thrones]]'' also made an appearance.{{cite web|url=http://www.manilatimes.net/15-reasons-to-go-to-the-asia-pop-comic-con-manila-this-weekend/219203/|title=15 reasons to go to the Asia Pop Comic Con Manila this weekend - The Manila Times Online|website=www.manilatimes.net}} [[Colton Haynes]], who plays [[Roy Harper (comics)|Roy Harper]] in the series ''[[Arrow (TV series)|Arrow]]'', also appeared. [[Jeremy Shada]], the voice actor of [[Finn the Human]] in the popular hit [[Adventure Time]] was also present with a performance with his band [[Make Out Monday]].{{cite web|url=http://www.philstar.com/lifestyle-features/2015/09/23/1503109/asiapop-comicon-return-2016|title=AsiaPop Comicon to return in 2016|first=Rick Olivares,|last=contributor|publisher=}}{{cite web|url=http://www.rappler.com/entertainment/news/106666-avengers-paul-bettany-vision-manila-asia-pop-comic-con|title=30 facts about awesome 'Avengers' star Paul Bettany|publisher=}} The convention also hosted the inaugural Cosplay Authority Global Challenge (CAGE). Also present were local comic book artists such as Steven Segovia, Mark Torres, Mico Suayan, and Carlo Pagulayan whose work span several renowned comic book companies, such as [[Dark Horse Comics|Dark Horse]], [[Marvel Comics|Marvel]], and [[DC Comics|DC]]. Renowned cosplayers such as [[Riki LeCotey|Riddle (Riki LeCotey)]], [[Alodia Gosiengfiao]], and Vampy Bit Me (Linda Le) were part of the festivities. Other attendees were Pop culture industry icons such as YouTube personalities Octopimp and [[Holly Conrad|Commander Holly (Holly Conrad)]], props and costume designer [[Bill Doran (costume designer)|Bill Doran]], and several others.https://thelasallian.com/2015/09/26/the-bright-lights-of-asia-pop-comic-con/https://www.spot.ph/newsfeatures/the-latest-news-features/63669/10-things-that-happened-at-the-asia-pop-comic-con-press-conference Over 29,000 attendees were reported. ===2016=== The 2016 convention was held from August 26 through 28 at the [[SMX Convention Center]] in Pasay.{{cite web|url=http://www.ungeek.ph/2016/01/announcement-asia-pop-comicon-manila-2016-happens-this-august/|title=ANNOUNCEMENT: Asia Pop Comicon Manila 2016 happens this August!|date=19 January 2016|publisher=}} English actor [[Nicholas Hoult]] who is known for portraying a young [[Beast (comics)|Beast]] in the ''[[X-Men (film series)|X-Men]]'' and [[Nux (Mad Max character)|Nux]] in the critically acclaimed film ''[[Mad Max: Fury Road]]'' appeared as one of the celebrity guests.{{cite web|url=http://cebudailynews.inquirer.net/101396/nicholas-hoult-to-grace-asiapop-comicon-in-manila|title=Nicholas Hoult to grace AsiaPOP Comicon in Manila|first=Apple|last=Ta-as|date=14 August 2016|publisher=}} Actress [[Millie Bobby Brown]], who is known for her roles as ''Eleven'' in ''[[Stranger Things (TV series)|Stranger Things]]'' and young Alice in ''[[Once Upon a Time (TV series)|Once Upon a Time]]'', also attended the convention.{{cite web|url=http://pop.inquirer.net/2016/08/hollywood-child-star-millie-bobby-brown-to-bring-stranger-things-phenomenon-to-asiapop-comicon-manila-2016/|title=Hollywood Child Star Millie Bobby Brown to Bring ‘Stranger Things’ Phenomenon to AsiaPOP Comicon Manila 2016 - InqPOP!|date=10 August 2016|publisher=}}{{cite web|url=http://lifestyle.inquirer.net/236198/your-super-guide-to-the-2016-asia-pop-comicon-manila|title=Your Super guide to the 2016 Asia Pop Comicon Manila|first=Vinz|last=Lamorena|publisher=}} Actresses [[Holland Roden]] and [[Hayley Atwell]] initially confirmed their attendance in the convention, but later dropped out due to scheduling conflicts.{{cite news|title=Holland Roden coming to APCC Manila 2016|url=http://www.rappler.com/entertainment/news/142424-teen-wolf-asia-pop-comic-con-apcc-manila-2016|accessdate=August 17, 2016|work=[[Rappler]]|date=August 9, 2016}}http://news.abs-cbn.com/entertainment/08/09/16/hayley-atwell-cancels-ph-visit Both of them were replaced by Australian actress [[Claire Holt]], best known for her role in ''[[The Vampire Diaries]]'' and ''[[The Originals (TV series)|The Originals]]''.{{cite news|title='Vampire Diaries' star coming to PH|url=http://news.abs-cbn.com/entertainment/08/17/16/vampire-diaries-star-coming-to-ph|accessdate=August 18, 2016|work=[[ABS-CBN News]]|date=August 17, 2016}} English actor [[Joe Dempsie]], known for his roles of Chris Miles on the teen comedy-drama series ''[[Skins (UK TV series)|Skins]]'' and Gendry on ''[[Game of Thrones]]'', attended the convention.http://www.wheninmanila.com/joe-dempsie-talks-game-of-thrones-asiapop-comic-con-2016/ [[Marvel Comics]] writer [[C. B. Cebulski]] hosted ''Hall M'', which showcased never before seen footage for the upcoming ''[[Luke Cage (TV series)|Luke Cage]]'' television series and the next installment in the [[Marvel Cinematic Universe|MCU]] [[Doctor Strange (2016 film)|Doctor Strange]].{{cite web|url=https://www.asiapopcomicon.com/manila/partywithus_hallM|title=AsiaPop Comicon Manila 2017|first=AsiaPop Comicon Manila|last=2017|website=www.asiapopcomicon.com}}{{cite web|url=http://www.wheninmanila.com/look-marvel-cb-cebulski-raves-about-philippines-on-twitter/|title=LOOK: Marvel’s C.B. Cebulski Raves about the Philippines on Twitter - When In Manila|website=www.wheninmanila.com}}{{cite web|url=http://cnnphilippines.com/lifestyle/2016/08/28/PHOTOS-Day-3-of-AsiaPOP-Comicon-Manila-2016.html|title=PHOTOS: Day 3 of AsiaPOP Comicon Manila 2016|publisher=}} The [[Philippine Wrestling Revolution]] held full shows.{{cite web|url=http://www.gmanetwork.com/news/story/579503/scitech/technology/asiapop-comicon-manila-a-weekend-of-absolute-geekdom|title=AsiaPOP ComiCon Manila: A weekend of absolute geekdom|publisher=}} The Philippine eSports Organization (PeSO) hosted eSports competitions as part of APCC. The second edition of CAGE returned.{{cite web|url=http://esports.inquirer.net/16033/peso-bring-esports-festival-asia-pop-comic-con|title=PeSO to bring the eSports Festival to Asia Pop Comic Con - Esports by Inquirer|date=30 July 2016|publisher=}} APCC Manila 2016 was also attended by various guests personalities and global cosplayers such as: J-Rock singer [[Hiroshi Kitadani]] from the anime music supergroup [[JAM Project]], comic book illustrators [[Mike Zeck]], Ken Lashley, [[Billy Tan]], and Jason Palmer, as well as global cosplayers, Ani Mia, Lindze Merritt, [[Riki LeCotey]], and Yugana Senshi Uon. They are joined by artist [[Simone Legno]] of [[tokidoki]] and representing Filipino artistry were cosplayers [[Alodia Gosiengfiao]] and [[Myrtle Sarrosa]]; beauty vlogger Say Tioco and artist extraordinaire [[Whilce Portacio]], also known as the creator of Bishop of ''[[Uncanny X-Men]]''.{{cite web|url=http://www.manilatimes.net/a-tale-of-two-cons-apcc-part-1/282956/|title=A tale of two cons: APCC (Part 1) - The Manila Times Online|website=www.manilatimes.net}} Over 40,000 people attended the event.{{cite web|url=http://news.abs-cbn.com/life/08/24/17/what-to-expect-from-this-years-asiapop-comicon|title=What to expect from this year's AsiaPop Comicon|first=Shiela Reyes, ABS-CBN|last=News|publisher=}} ===2017=== [[File:NetflixboothduringAPCC2017.jpg|thumb|right|Booth of Netflix during APCC 2017]] The 2017 convention took place on August 25 to 27 at [[SMX Convention Center]], Pasay City.{{cite web|url=http://www.dugompinoy.com/2017/03/asia-pop-comicon-manila-2017.html|title=Asia Pop Comicon 2017 is Happening on August 25-27|publisher=}} Marvel once again hosted ''Hall M'' which featured never before scenes from upcoming [[List of video games based on Marvel Comics|video games]], [[List of television series based on Marvel Comics|television series]]{{cite web|url=https://heroichollywood.com/netflix-marvel-punisher/|title=Netflix's 'The Punisher' To Possibly Feature Another Marvel Hero|date=27 August 2017|publisher=}} and movies such as ''[[Thor: Ragnarok]]'' and ''[[Ant-Man and the Wasp]]''.{{cite web|url=http://www.comicsuniverse.it/descrizione-nuove-scene-the-punisher-thor-ragnarok-ant-man-and-the-wasp/|title=Descrizione delle nuove scene di The Punisher, Thor: Ragnarok, Ant-Man and the Wasp e Inhumans|date=28 August 2017|publisher=}} Netflix brought some of its Stranger Things' casts namely [[Joe Keery]] and [[Noah Schnapp]], who play Steve Harrington and Will Byers, and season two newcomers [[Dacre Montgomery]], who plays Billy and [[Sadie Sink]] who plays Max.{{cite web|url=http://news.abs-cbn.com/entertainment/08/18/17/stranger-things-cast-coming-to-ph-for-asiapop-comicon-2017|title='Stranger Things' cast coming to PH for AsiaPop Comicon 2017|first=ABS-CBN|last=News|publisher=}}{{cite web|url=http://cnnphilippines.com/entertainment/2017/08/26/stranger-things-asiapop-comicon.html|title=LOOK: ‘Stranger Things’ cast members attend AsiaPOP Comicon Manila|publisher=}} [[Ray Fisher (actor)|Ray Fisher]] who plays [[Cyborg (comics)|Cyborg]] in the [[DC Extended Universe]] and [[Tyler Hoechlin]] who is known for his roles as [[List_of_Teen_Wolf_characters#Derek_Hale|Derek Hale]] in [[Teen Wolf]] and [[Superman]] in [[Supergirl (TV series)|Supergirl]] were the major celebrity guests.{{cite web|url=https://www.rappler.com/entertainment/news/180131-photos-video-asiapop-comic-con-manila-2017-apcc|title=WATCH: Scenes from AsiaPOP Comicon Manila 2017|publisher=}}{{cite web|url=http://news.abs-cbn.com/entertainment/08/05/17/justice-league-star-ray-fisher-headlines-asiapop-comicon-2017|title='Justice League' star Ray Fisher headlines AsiaPop Comicon 2017|first=ABS-CBN|last=News|publisher=}}{{cite web|url=http://www.gmanetwork.com/news/lifestyle/artandculture/620786/ray-fisher-announced-as-celeb-guest-at-asiapop-comicon-manila-2017/story/|title=Ray Fisher announced as celeb guest at AsiaPOP Comicon Manila 2017|publisher=}}{{cite web|url=http://www.gmanetwork.com/news/lifestyle/artandculture/621428/justice-league-s-cyborg-supergirl-s-superman-to-head-apcc-2017/story/|title=Justice League’s Cyborg, Supergirl’s Superman to head APCC 2017|publisher=}} Japanese idol [[Serena Kozuki]], also known as “Live Monster” was one of the guest entertainers.{{cite web|url=https://animephproject.com/2017/08/01/solo-japanese-idol-serena-kozuki-coming-asiapop-comicon-manila/|title=Solo Japanese idol Serena Kozuki coming to AsiaPOP Comicon Manila|first=|last=rayan|date=1 August 2017|publisher=}} Voice actor [[Gaku Space]] known for his role as [[Characters_of_Overwatch#Genji|Genji]] of the critically acclaimed [[Overwatch (video game)|Overwatch]] video game was also present.{{cite web|url=http://www.gmanetwork.com/news/lifestyle/hobbiesandactivities/623147/asiapop-comicon-manila-2017-promises-a-bigger-and-better-pop-culture-experience/story/|title=FROM AUGUST 25-27: AsiaPop ComiCon Manila 2017 promises a 'bigger and better' pop culture experience|publisher=}} The Cosplay Authority Global Challenge returned for the a third edition with notable cosplayers namely [[Alodia Gosiengfiao]], [[Myrtle Sarrosa]], [[Pion Kim]], Jinbehindinfinity, Philip Odango{{Cite news|url=http://pop.inquirer.net/2017/07/get-creative-asiapop-comicon-manila-announces-first-batch-international-artists/|title=Get Creative: AsiaPOP Comicon Manila announces first batch of international artists - InqPOP!|date=2017-07-12|work=InqPOP!|access-date=2017-10-25|language=en-US}}, and Haiden Hazard serving as judges.{{cite web|url=http://www.interaksyon.com/8-things-to-do-at-asiapop-comicon-this-weekend/|title=8 geeky things to do at the AsiaPOP Comicon this weekend, Aug. 25 to 27|date=25 August 2017|publisher=}} Various comic and graphic artists such as Carl Potts, veteran penciler/inker [[Rodney Ramos]],{{cite web|url=http://www.dageeks.com/geekery/asiapop-comicon-manila-2017-brings-in-tyler-hoechlin-and-rodney-ramos/|title=AsiaPOP Comicon Manila 2017 Brings in Tyler Hoechlin and Rodney Ramos|date=11 August 2017|publisher=}} Whilce Portacio and [[Shoji Kawamori]], the renowned creator of the [[Macross]] anime franchise also graced the event with their presence.{{cite web|url=https://www.animepilipinas.com/2017/08/05/asiapop-comicon-2017-host-macross-shoji-kawamori/|title=AsiaPOP Comicon Manila 2017 to host Macross creator Shoji Kawamori|first=J. M.|last=Melegrito|date=5 August 2017|publisher=}}{{cite web|url=http://robotpilipinas.blogspot.com/2017/08/shoji-kawamori-coming-to-asiapop-comicon-manila-2017.html|title=BREAKING: Macross Creator Shoji Kawamori Is Coming To AsiaPOP Comicon Manila 2017|publisher=}}{{cite web|url=http://news.abs-cbn.com/life/08/27/17/gundam-optimus-prime-creator-among-asiapops-top-draws|title=Gundam, Optimus Prime creator among AsiaPop's top draws|first=Rick|last=Olivares|publisher=}} The [[Philippine Wrestling Revolution]] conducted house shows for the second time.{{cite web|url=http://www.ourawesomeplanet.com/awesome/2017/07/philippine-wrestling-revolution.html#vpxVQqAiu0povQD6.97|title=Philippine Wrestling Revolution:|website=Our Awesome Planet}} Toy designers like Tokidoki co-founder Simone Legno; Jason Freeny, whom is known for his anatomical toy sculptures; and Quiccs, an illustrator, toy designer, and graffiti artist known for his love for Japanese robot culture where in attendance. APCC reported over 60,000 attendees. ===2018=== The fourth installment of APCC was held on July 27-29, 2018 at SMX Convention Center, Pasay, Manila.https://www.rappler.com/life-and-style/arts-and-culture/208385-highlights-asiapop-comicon-manila-2018http://www.gmanetwork.com/news/lifestyle/artandculture/662018/interactive-booths-and-toys-galore-at-asiapop-comicon-manila-2018/story/ Celebrity guests include [[Finn Jones]] (known for his role as the [[Iron Fist (comics)|titular character]] in Netflix's [[Iron Fist (TV series)|Iron Fist]]), [[Tye Sheridan]] (who plays the lead in [[Ready Player One (film)|Ready Player One]] and [[Cyclops (Marvel Comics)|Cyclops]] in [[X-Men: Apocalypse]]) and [[Osric Chau]] (who portrays [[Kevin Tran]] on [[Supernatural (U.S. TV series)|Supernatural]]) http://www.gmanetwork.com/news/lifestyle/hobbiesandactivities/653742/lsquo-iron-fist-rsquo-stars-finn-jones-and-jessica-henwick-are-the-first-confirmed-guests-for-asiapop-comicon-manila-2018/story/https://entertainment.mb.com.ph/2018/07/04/tye-sheridan-joins-asiapop-comicon-in-ph/ [[Jessica Henwick]] was initially announced as one of the guests celebrity but cancelled citing unforeseen circumstances.https://www.rappler.com/entertainment/news/206069-jessica-henwick-cancels-appearance-asia-pop-comicon-manila-2018 Marvel Vice-President of Creative Development [[Stephen Wacker]] hosted Hall M which presented clip from an upcoming episode of [[Cloak & Dagger (TV series)|Cloak and Dagger]].http://cnnphilippines.com/life/entertainment/2018/07/30/asiapop-comic-con-2018-recap.html Disney Studios introduced Hall D featuring sessions from Disney artist [[Mark Henn]]. The hall also featured the internationally renowned furniture designer [[Kenneth Cobonpue]] and the unveiling of his works on Star Wars themed furniture collections.https://2ndopinion.ph/2018/07/31/kenneth-cobonpue-star-wars-collection-apcc-2018/https://news.abs-cbn.com/life/10/10/18/look-kenneth-cobonpue-unveils-star-wars-collection The Netflix panel (reintroduced as Hall N) returned which featured special screenings and previews of future releases such as [[Castlevania (TV series)|Castlevania]]http://collider.com/castlevania-season-2-trailer/ and [[Godzilla: Planet of the Monsters]]. The showcase also included appearances from [[Luke Cage (TV series)|Luke Cage]] (along with Jones) star [[Mike Colter]], showrunner [[Cheo Hodari Coker]], [[Mustafa Shakir]], who plays the villain [[Bushmaster (Marvel Comics)|Bushmaster]], and Iron Fist producer [[Raven Metzner]].http://news.abs-cbn.com/entertainment/07/12/18/luke-cage-star-mike-colter-to-visit-manila-this-month Convention regulars, Brian Mur, Stanley Lau, Simone Legno, Alex Sinclaire, Lan Medina, Mike McKone, Phil Noto, and Whilce Portacio made their appearances along with new comers Artists Amanda Visell and Michelle Valigura. Professional cosplayers, Canvas Cosplay (Philip Odango), Leon Chiro, Vera Chimera and Yugana Senshiuon served as judges for the CAGE.https://www.rappler.com/entertainment/news/202758-celebrity-guests-asia-pop-comic-convention-2018 [[ONE Championship|ONE FC Heavyweight Champion]] [[Brandon Vera]] also served as a judge. http://cnnphilippines.com/life/entertainment/2018/07/30/asiapop-comic-con-2018-recap.html The convention was noted for the introduction of the [[Jollibee|Jollibee]] [[Funko| Funko Pop]].http://news.abs-cbn.com/life/07/27/18/pinoy-fans-line-up-for-hours-to-get-jollibee-funko-pop-toyhttp://news.abs-cbn.com/life/multimedia/photo/07/27/18/jollibee-funko-pop-at-asiapop-comicon ==Locations and dates== {| class="wikitable" |- ! No. ! style="width:10%;"|Dates ! style="width:18%;"|Location ! width=2%|Attendance ! Major Official Comic-Con Celebrity Guests ! style="width:18%;"|Notes |- | 1 | Sept 17-20, 2015 || [[World Trade Center Metro Manila]], Pasay City, Manila || 29,000 || [[Paul Bettany]], [[Colton Haynes]], [[Nathalie Emmanuel]]|| Inaugural. [[Jason Momoa]] initially confirmed his attendance but later dropped out due to scheduling conflicts. |- | 2 | Aug 26-28, 2016|| [[SMX Convention Center]], Pasay City, Manila || 40,000 || [[Nicholas Hoult]], [[Millie Bobby Brown]], [[Claire Holt]], [[Joe Dempsie]]|| [[Holland Roden]] and [[Hayley Atwell]] initially confirmed their attendance, but later dropped out due to scheduling conflicts. |- | 3 | Aug 25-27, 2017|| [[SMX Convention Center]], Pasay City, Manila || 60,000 || [[Ray Fisher (actor)|Ray Fisher]], [[Tyler Hoechlin]], [[Joe Keery]], [[Noah Schnapp]], [[Sadie Sink]], [[Dacre Montgomery]]|| Keery, Schnapp, Sink and Montgomery were the celebrity guests from the Netflix Panel |- | 4 | July 27-29, 2018|| [[SMX Convention Center]], Pasay City, Manila||TBA || [[Finn Jones]], [[Tye Sheridan]], [[Osric Chau]], [[Mike Colter]], [[Mustafa Shakir]] || Colter, Shakir and Jones were the celebrity guests from the Netflix Panel. [[Jessica Henwick]] initially confirmed her attendance but later dropped citing unforeseen circumstances |} ==References== {{reflist}} ==External links== * {{official website|https://www.asiapopcomicon.com/manila/}} * [https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=QP6V322dLsM AsiaPOP Comicon 2016 Artists Panel Interview] * [https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=f7gfYDlG26c&t=228s Haiden Hazard Interview] [[Category:Comics conventions]] [[Category:Cosplay]] [[Category:Events in Metro Manila]]
